title: Build Community
description: Engage with researchers who are passionate about using digital tools to enhance their work.

title: Share Ideas
description: Inspire peers with your work, be inspired by their work, and share work through digital and professional tools.

title: Learn New Skills
description: Develop digital research skills through workshops, discussions, and planned events.

title: Hands-On Collaboration
description: Cultivate skills in small groups through activities and by building a digital project from idea to prototype.

title: Digital Research Methods
description: Learn new methods of automating tasks, analyzing data, streamlining workflow, and sharing ideas.

title: Professional Development
description: Evolve as a productive and generative researcher through digital platforms and colloborative sessions.
